e107Plugin.name: Voice eXeSystem
e107Plugin.summary: Theme ShortCode Generator for TeamSpeak3, Ventrilo, Mumble, Discord, and many more.
e107Plugin.description: Save TeamSpeak3/Ventrilo/Mumble/Discord Server Information and enables the user to add a join button to that server on the theme's shortcode area. Also if you use another communications program, you can share the custom html code in this plugin.
